snippet.title: Game & Watch - Spitball Sparky (c)1984 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
This the Game & Watch Spitball Sparky handheld game, a Nintendo product released in 1984 and 1 of just 2 units in the Super Color series featuring this single large vertical screen an a colour overlay.  There is an older video for this on the channel, but due to some recording issues at the time the quality wasn't up to scratch although the gameplay is maybe better, I fail to activate the stage bonus at any point in this one.

Recent work on Game & Watch emulation has come from Algestam, with earlier work being done by Sean Riddle and hap.  DarthMarino provided the artwork for more recently emulated units, while hydef was generally responsible for the artwork on ones emulated before 2020, links to the artwork are below

https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
